00057                 public function send()
00058                 {
00059                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00060                         {
00061                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00062                         }
00063 
00064                         if (!Email::is_valid($_POST['email']))
00065                         {
00066                                 $this->flash(l('Please enter a valid email address'), 'error');
00067                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00068                         }
00069 
00070                         if (!Antispam::check_math())
00071                         {
00072                                 $this->flash(Antispam::random_comment(), 'error');
00073                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00074                         }
00075                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00076                         $contact_email = new ContactEmail($_POST);
00077                         $contact_email->send();
00078 
00079                         if (isset($_POST['remember_me']))
00080                         {
00081                                 $this->set_credentials($_POST['name'],
00082                                         $_POST['email'],
00083                                         $_POST['URL']);
00084                         }
00085                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'thank_you'));
00086                 }
00087 
00093                 public function thank_you()
00094                 {
00095                         $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'home', 'after' => 10));
00096                 }
00097         }
